Blot yelps when he was shot. He feels ashamed.
----------------------------=
--------------------------------------------------------------
Airbomber: I=
 know, man! Arrow, an old friend of mine, asked me to come to the Maximal b=
ase! I need you to come with me, Time Warp, he said he wanted to tell me so=
mething about Infectra. Shall we go?...

  ::Hun-Grr hears what the creature says:: 
  Hun-Grr: When =
Hun-Grr want Quintesson's opinion he ask for it.  If 
  Decepticons are not=
 on Hun-Grr's side, then they die! 
  ::He sees Blot, Cutthroat and Sinnert=
win fighting.  He shoots each of them 
  once:: 
  Hun-Grr: SHUT UP! 
  ::H=
e then walks to the front of the base and opens up his comm:: 
  Hun-Grr: T=
his Hun-Grr.  Any Decepticons here? 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Banzai-Tron gets hit dead=
 on by the blue fire.  His body is severely 
  charred:: 
  Banzai-Tron: *c=
ough* that.. the... best.. you got? 
  ::He all of a sudden realizes that h=
e is falling.  His flying mechanisms have 
  failed and plummets to the gro=
und, in stasis lock:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Time Warp wakes up from his long sleep:=
: 
  Time Warp: Hey Airbomber, you up? Because i think that today might jus=
t be 
  the day we find Infectra.
